subject: refactor: rewrite PWA with dedicated module, prompt-based updates, and Safari/Firefox fallback
body:
Previous autoUpdate + injectRegister:'script' approach was unreliable.
New implementation uses virtual:pwa-register with registerType:'prompt'
for explicit SW control, hourly update polling, a green "Update" button
in the header, and browser-specific install instructions for non-Chromium
browsers.

https://claude.ai/code/session_0167SDAxxvML8iE9sLJGgmVa
